original: aa pa r'a dzi t'a s'a dha nam /
analyzed: aa pa r'a dzi t'a s'a dha nam /

original: gzhan gyis mi thub ma'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: gzhan gyis mi thub ma'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Means of Accomplishment of Aparajita

original: 'phags ma gzhan gyis mi thub ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags ma gzhan gyis mi thub ma la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: gzhan gyis mi thub ma sku mdog ser mo zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa /
analyzed: gzhan gyis mi thub ma sku mdog ser mo zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa /
translated: Aparajita is yellow, with one face and two arms.

original: rin po che sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis nye bar mdzes pa /🔽tshogs bdag yang dag par gnon pa /🔽phyag g-yas pa thal lcag brdeg @219b pa'i tshul du byas pa /
analyzed: rin po che sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis nye bar mdzes pa / tshogs bdag yang dag par gnon pa / phyag g-yas pa thal lcag brdeg @219b pa'i tshul du byas pa /
translated: She is beautified by ornaments of various jewels.🔽She tramples on Gaṇeśa.🔽Her right hand is in the gesture of striking with the palm.

original: phyag g-yon pa zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub thugs kar gnas pa /
analyzed: phyag g-yon pa zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub thugs kar gnas pa /
translated: Her left hand is at her heart in the threatening gesture with a noose.

original: zhal mche ba gtsigs shing shin tu 'jigs par byed pa ma lus pa'i bdud 'joms pa /
analyzed: zhal mche ba gtsigs shing shin tu 'jigs par byed pa ma lus pa'i bdud 'joms pa /
translated: Her face is terrifying with bared fangs, destroying all demons.

original: tshangs pa la sogs pa'i gdug pa can gyi drag po'i lha rnams kyis bskor zhing gdugs bsgreng ba'o zhes so //
analyzed: tshangs pa la sogs pa'i gdug pa can gyi drag po'i lha rnams kyis bskor zhing gdugs bsgreng ba'o zhes so //
translated: She is surrounded by fierce gods such as Brahmā, holding up parasols.

original: gzhan gyis mi thub ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: gzhan gyis mi thub ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The means of accomplishment of Aparajita is complete.
